Performer:
Takezawa Danjirō IV (see also Takezawa Danshichi) (竹澤団二郎 (四))

Alternate Name: Takezawa Danshichi (竹澤団七)

Dates: '1953-1981/04'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
